attributes.action: Ban the use of fireworks for public. Only sell for events.
attributes.additional_details: Because a large amount of animals are taking there last breaths because fireworks are so petrifying for them. Also large amount of animals having heart attacks and panic attacks due to them. They need to put a stop to it.
attributes.background: Ban the use of fireworks for public use. To save people with disabilities from stress and animals stressing and dying.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
